draft_picks.analysis: Elite receiver prospect to pair with Daniel Jones. Immediate starter with Pro Bowl potential.
Prototypical left tackle to protect Jones' blindside. High floor, high ceiling prospect.
Son of Jerry Rice adds depth at receiver. Good route runner with reliable hands.

positional_needs_addressed.wide_receiver: Major need addressed with Harrison Jr.
positional_needs_addressed.secondary: Still needs attention in free agency

analyst_quotes.quote: The Giants got their franchise receiver in Harrison. This could transform their offense.
Aggressive move to trade up for Harrison shows the Giants are all-in on Jones.

summary: The Giants addressed their most pressing need at receiver while also bolstering the offensive line. The trade up for Harrison was costly but could pay dividends if he develops into an elite weapon.
